Nothing was ruined. These are the characters we love and know from the first game\, but this game shows you the cold hard reality of a post apocalyptic world without sugarcoating everything. There are no winners or heroes in this world. Its not a fairly tale and never was. It answers important questions of human nature and behavior.The graphics are out of this world\, i played it in 4K HDR and its almost CG level good. The animations are mind blowing. The combat is visceral and ruthless.Regardless what you think about the story. This is the best game Naughty Dog ever made and there are NO better games currently on the market regarding the exclusives.It sparks debates and it should be\, because forgettable art is not art.
